title: Ae/Pr视觉特效和转场BCC插件包 2020 v13.0.0 Win/Mac
author: 大众脸
content: 这是一款强大的BCC视觉特效插件包，为视频图像合成、处理 、键控、着色、变形等提供全面解决方案，支持OpenGL和双CPU加速，拥有超百种特效效果，包括多种视频特效和转场，支持AE和PR软件。Continuum 2019有诸多更新内容。
supported_versions: Adobe After Effects CS6 – CC 2020，Premiere Pro CS6 – CC 2020

other.插件介绍英文: Continuum 2019 is the latest major upgrade for the most comprehensive plug-in collection on the market. Key features include the rebirth of Particle Illusion, the famed motion graphics generator, new Title Studio image-processing shaders such as glows, rays, and blurs for visually-stunning titles and lower thirds, new Mocha Essentials workspace with 4 new spline tools like magnetic edge snapping and geometric shapes for faster tracking and masking, new point-driven parameter tracking powered by Mocha, and overall GPU-acceleration.
